contact_name: European Commission Directorate General Education and Culture

resources.description: A Statistical Overview of the Erasmus Programme in 2012-13
resources.name: A Statistical Overview of the Erasmus Programme in 2012-13.

resources.description: Data dictionary used for reporting on Erasmus results by National Agencies. The national reports are used for collecting and analysing Erasmus data at European level. Download of the zip contains word files. "
resources.name: Data dictionary used for reporting on Erasmus results by National Agencies.

resources.description: The European Union support for student and staff exchanges and university cooperation in 2012-2013
resources.name: Erasmus - Facts, Figures and Trends.

resources.description: List of all institutions participating in the programme for at least one year between 2007-2013
resources.name: List of all institutions participating in the programme for at least one year between 2007-2013.

resources.description: Raw data of Erasmus mobility for teaching assignments in 2012-13
resources.name: Raw data of Erasmus mobility for teaching assignments in 2012-13.

resources.description: Raw data of Erasmus staff mobility for training in 2012-13
resources.name: Raw data of Erasmus staff mobility for training in 2012-13.

resources.description: Raw data of Erasmus student mobility (study exchanges and work placements in 2012-13).
resources.name: Raw data of Erasmus student mobility (study exchanges and work placements in 2012-13).

description: This dataset contains the statistical overview of Erasmus mobility for students (study exchanges and work placements) and staff (teaching assignments and staff training) in 2012-13, with the corresponding raw data. Statistics are presented at country and European level for various criteria, e.g.: age, gender, grant, duration, special needs, subject area, level of study, sending and receiving country, etc.
title: Erasmus mobility statistics 2012-13
name: erasmus-mobility-statistics-2012-13
